Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Fullerton and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Fullerton  to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
